website_summaries.verdict: The best budget heated lunchbox meant for single meals at work or while on the go.
pros: Flat-bottom heating plate fits snugly inside the basic, soft lunch box
Heating plate is removable so you can use the bag as a regular lunch box if desired
cons: Corded design makes it difficult to keep food hot while commuting to work

customer_reviews.title: The sides of the pouch that holds the heating element ...
customer_reviews.text: The sides of the pouch that holds the heating element started to melt and stick together shortly after I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Akash M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Photographers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. She is a photographer for Lifetouch and they don't always get a lunch at noon, sometimes later. She plugs this in when she starts setting up her equipment at her location, and leaves it plugged in while she works. She said it works PERFECT and is so happy she has it. It keeps it at the perfect temperature after everything is heated up.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Smith

customer_reviews.title: So far, not good.
customer_reviews.text: I am currently eating a cold Chipotle bowl. I plugged the HotLogic Mini in at 7:15 when I got into my classroom. It was plugged into an outlet that I know works and four hours later the ENTIRE thing was still cold. Honestly, I would have had a warmer meal just leaving the bowl out on my desk. I'll give this another shot this weekend but I'm not optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: T. C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great, outstanding customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This hot plate served my husband well for over a year. It heats up like it says, in about 1 hours to an even, hot temperature. The hot plate broke (stopped heating) at some point and the customer service was so amazing! They shipped us the replacement within 3 days. It was so effortless and easy. I bought Pyrex 6-Cup Rectangular glass container with lid that fit this portable oven perfectly and also bought Bestek 75W Power Inverter DC 12V to 110V AC Car 3.1A 2 USB Ports, both here on Amazon. He used it in his work van basically, and we had no issues. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Beltanette

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest thing ever. I work in a patrol car and hate eating out. Thought I'd be resigned to sandwiches everyday until my wife found this. Now I have hot food everyday! I've used it for everything from steak to pizza and it works like a charm! Takes about 2 hours to heat up an out of the fridge meal but when it's done it perfect! Buy the Pyrex glass container that fits for $5 and you're all set. I bought 2 and use them every day...greatest thing ever!
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK

customer_reviews.title: The BEST thing since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I saw this when I was looking for something to heat up my food while I'm in my critical care classes in a building with no microwave. I saw all the reviews and decided to try it out. It came super fast and I used it and it was the best! My food was very hot like I just cooked it and it stayed hot while I ate. My classesmates thing it's adorable. I absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.author: Chastity

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I used exclusively at work in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I used exclusively at work in the factory with over 2000 employees where you actually on 30 min. lunch time wait in line for the microwave sometimes 15 minutes. I stooped taking meals from home to work just for that reason. Well, that issue is resolved with this product. Plug in Mini Personal Portable Oven 45 min. before lunch time and your meal is worm enough to enjoy it. No buttons, no temperature control, no fear of overheating, no smell of food coming out of the case - plug-it and leave-it. I tried 50 min worm-up time and I was satisfied with warmth of the food. This is now 5-days-a-week my personal "microwave".
customer_reviews.author: Mike Spasic

customer_reviews.title: Been Needing This
customer_reviews.text: Came in the mail today just in time for me to put my semi-frozen Trader Joes Chicken Tikka Masala in it to warm up for lunch. 2 hrs later I'm eating. Worked great. Look forward to trying it with left-overs. Update: Really enjoying the Hot Logic Mini Oven. Used in on leftovers at home and as long as you aren't in any hurry and plan ahead it works perfectly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cranky

customer_reviews.title: Material ripped from factory
customer_reviews.text: The item material was ripped when it was packaged in the original plastic from the manufacturer. I love the product as I have 2 of the family sized and this is my 4th of this size. This is the first time experiencing the tear as these are usually very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for warming bread
customer_reviews.text: Great for warming bread!!! There's nothing like a perfectly heated warm roll. I have a microwave, a wonderful toaster/convection oven and a full size brand new gas oven too. But nothing warms rolls better or faster than this little device. Yes, you have to watch not to leave the rolls in too long or, as the instructions say, the bottom will get too crunchy. I turn mine over after two minutes or so. But what comes out of this is perfect. I use it in my house! Haven't tried cooking other stuff in the thing yet. But the rolls are themselves worth the price. Susan
customer_reviews.author: Paris 27

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: It came with a couple of tears in the seam!!!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted this one to work...no go
customer_reviews.text: I was so bummed I wanted this one to work! Unfortunately, it doesn't heat up high enough to cook the food even over a period of twelve hours. I cannot explain enough how much I wanted this to be amazing. I bought it too early, and just used it over a three week business trip..returned home just in time to be outside the return window. I hope my loss will help others.
customer_reviews.author: C-girl

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had it a week and the exterior case has a tear near the zipper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but poorly executed
customer_reviews.text: The slow heat personal oven is not a bad idea but there are some design flaws and in my opinion, the product is also poorly constructed. To begin with, it lacks a on/off switch therefore the only way to turn it on or off is to plug and unplug the power, this is kind of clumsy. Secondly, there is no temperature control. Once the container of food reached the desired temperature, the oven cannot be turned down to prevent the food from overcooked. For that reason, if green veggies are left for too long, they will turn brown. Finally the case is really low quality. It is very flimsy and insulation is next to nothing.
customer_reviews.author: C. K. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great for healthy food on the go
customer_reviews.text: As a truck driver, this thing is a MUST have if you're tired of cold and unhealthy food. I can finally pack my own meals and be healthy while on the road and not subject to eating crappy fast food. I've told many other truck drivers about this and they have ordered it too.. My only gripe with it is, It will burn the rice that is on the bottom of your container, and it will over cook broccoli. That's the only 2 things so far I have noticed with it..
customer_reviews.author: Ed Stubbs Jr.

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A WALL PLUG!!! NOT FOR CARS!!!
customer_reviews.text: MMAKE SURE YOU K IW THAT THIS IS NOT FOR YOUR CAR! Its a WALL PLUG...i wish i would have went to use this vefore the return window was done. Unfortunately i sat it to the side for a month , then prepared a nice "warm" lunch for my husband to warm' IN HIS CAR' then looked at it to gind uts a darn wall plug and it was to late to exchange/return..will have to buy a $20 converter
customer_reviews.author: Rachel T

customer_reviews.title: THIS LITTLE GUY, DELIVERS BIG!
customer_reviews.text: As a pilot for a major airline, I spend my share of days on the road. I grew tired of fast food years ago and at hotel restaurants, you rarely get what you pay for. This little oven allows you to prepare nearly anything at home and enjoy it in your travels. Leftovers from your kitchen always taste better the second time around on the road. I freeze my meals the night before. Then drop the freezer bag right in the oven. Or put everything in a glass pan with a sealed lid a toss it in directly. Bring a little bit of home with you on every trip, by carrying this compact and very effective mini oven. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This will change your life!
customer_reviews.text: Omg We love this!!!! Where has this been all my life?!? My poor husband has had to be eating all of his lunches cold, I always felt bad for him, he would either have to waste time going to a restaurant to purchase expensive food, or he would get a lame sandwich or would have to eat His packed food cold.... well no more!!! For some reason everything tastes better when warmed in this thing. We cooked some $3 Frozen food section steak and potatoes meal today that tasted like it came from a nice restaurant, not kidding you! This thing is a life saver. G E T I T!
customer_reviews.author: Alondra Nino

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because its a great Idea.
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt work at all! I bought this because its a great Idea.. but this hardly heats up your food at all, no matter what container you use. I even tried letting the thing warm up for hours and still not warm enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and works great for lunch or for having warm food while wheeling.
customer_reviews.text: I make all kinds of stuff. The Sterilite 03211106 fits perfect and is almost water proof. I've done perogies, brats, hot dogs and all kinds of stuff on the trail. Toss in a bottle of chile con queso and the dip is ready when it's time for a snack. Often times I 'finish' off the flavor or stuff by putting it on a little grill I carry. This would work great for soup, stew, sloppy joes, chile and basically whatever you can think of. It keeps breakfast burritos warm until you are ready to eat! There are lots of youtube videos on different ideas you can do. It will actually cook your food to about 145 to 150 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: MJL

customer_reviews.title: Great way to warm leftovers and other food at work
customer_reviews.text: For those of us that prefer to avoid microwaving our food, the hot logic mini is a great way to warm leftovers and other foods for lunch at work. It will typically warm leftovers in 1-2 hours and frozen food items in 2+ hours. My only complaint is that it tends to dry out certain food times (like rice and peas) to the point they are hard an inedible. To avoid this, you need to add a little water to rice or peas to keep them moist.
customer_reviews.author: Family Man

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye to nasty, cold meals!! Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bad boy for my boyfriend who is an electrician. The sites where he works have electricity yet no microwave access. Sends me videos/pictures every single day of his hot food. Always thanks me for such an amazing gift. Goodbye to cold leftovers and especially goodbye to spending $15 on lunch everyday! He gets to eat a nice home cooked meal every day now :)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal D.

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave replacement
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a week and so far, I really love it. I love a hot meal for lunch. It has heated up my leftover pork chop and veggies, as well as my leftover chicken and veggies, as if they were just cooked. I had a bowl of soup that came out just the right temp. I'm singing it's praises to everyone at work. I'm more than thrilled I don't have to use the disgusting microwave at work anymore! Next week, I'll be trying something frozen!
customer_reviews.author: Colette Starliper

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Everyone Should Have At Least One
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, can't believe I didn't know they existed until a few months ago If you work in an office where everyone is disgusting and/or nobody likes you so they might do all number of horrible things to your food if you walk away from it, this is for you It actually works, I have no idea how or why; think "hot plate in a warming bag" A few days after I bought this one, I bought another one with the inverter so it can be used in the car Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Darshanna Tudor

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loves it
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend goes on and on about how much he loves this thing. He uses it for everything from thawed breakfast sandwiches and tv dinners to all kinds of home cooked leftovers. He usually plugs it up at his desk, but has used it in his truck before too. If I remember correctly, he said it takes around 30 minutes for a thawed breakfast sandwich and closer to an hour for meal boxes and bowls. Glass bowls take a little longer than plastic. He hasn't had any problems with it getting too hot and melting his plastic bowls or anything. If this thing ever goes out, I will definitely be getting him another one.
customer_reviews.author: VA_barb

customer_reviews.title: One Job
customer_reviews.text: It had one job... Reheat stuff that would be bad for the microwave... I bought this for my hotel room with the idea that within an hour or 2, it'll reheat. I bought this a month ago and used it maybe once or twice... The third time I used it, it didn't work, and i made sure it worked or didn't by putting a different appliance in the same socket. I thought I was crazy, but after an hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, no heat. This thing doesn't work, but at least the inside seems isolative and might use it as a lunch box, but really disappointed and bought an overly expensive lunch box
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Better that nothing
customer_reviews.text: Now days with the Pandemic issue going on is the only way that I have to warm up my food. My boss has one and she recommended to me. it has good quality materials, however it takes hours to warm up the food, for example if you had a topper in the fridge and you arrive at 8:00am and start warming up your food, it may be ready by noon or 1:00pm, but again is the only method to have warm food (besides fast food)
customer_reviews.author: José

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it! I was tired of standing in line ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this thing. I absolutely love it! I was tired of standing in line at the microwave at work. And you know how microwaves can dry out food or make meat rubbery? Forget about hat and get this product. I can throw if in my backpack with my laptop and not tell it's there. I plug it in when I get to the office in the morning, put my lunch in, and it is heated perfectly when lunch time rolls around. There is also an easy carry handle so I can unplug it and carry it to the common areas when eating lunch with friends. This has become an indispensable work item for me.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: did not get hot enough for me
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was small. you could put most anything in it to warm...unfortunately it took too long to heat things for me..Do not attempt heating anything from frozen.. it takes several hours.. defeating my purpose of freezing meals ahead of time.. I would have to defrost over night before trying to heat them up..Leftovers were fine as if you used a tight closed container.. I loved that you didn't need to watch over them..just plug it in and a few hours later they were warm...I got use to another brand that got hotter,,,.. odd thing is this one keep popping off more than the other one I had been using and not coming back on...
customer_reviews.author: Ken W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Addition for my desk
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this Hotlogic Mini twice: yesterday it was my fault lunch was not ready in time because I didn't put it in soon enough and had to nuke it for a little bit. Today, whole different story and I highly recommend this item! I put a DEVOUR Loaded Potato with Angus Beef & Bacon in at 8:30 am then continued about my work day. I feel it was probably ready before I took it off at 10:30 am but regardless, my lunch was perfectly heated through and didn't have that microwave overdoneness quality to it. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Liz B

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I don't like using the microwave at work because it's never clean. This lunch bag is just what I needed. For frozen foods, I plug it in about 2 hours prior to lunch and for refrigerated, 1 hour. I cannot believe how moist and fresh things are. I normally hate leftovers but this has been a game-changer. I was worried about food smells in my office as it warmed but there's none of that. I've used both cardboard takeout containers and glass and it's always perfect. Saved my diet and my wallet! If I could suggest 1 improvement is an outside zippered compartment for forks, napkins, etc. There's a kangaroo pocket for the cord but it's not sealed.
customer_reviews.author: ShellieJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing product!!! We practically use our plug in ones at home DAILY. Works amazing you will not be disappointed. My husband is a truck driver so I throw a meal or even leftovers in and can just leave it until he gets home and no matter the time his meal is hot and perfect. This one that plugs into a cigarette lighter he takes on the road with him for hot meals. I own 4 at home and won't be without them. Have bought for Christmas presents. Great invention... Buy the adapter one for your vehicle on the go and the plug in ones for your home. You'll love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Milkmanswife4

customer_reviews.title: Another happy customer ... So I bought another!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional chef, and I wanted to see how well this worked. IT'S GREAT! I put a frozen-solid turkey half-breast in there, (in a vacuum sealed bag, which I did myself) and it came out as if I had cooked a Sous Vide. I've also done Italian sausage straight from the freezer. It's NOT fast but it's effective. I used Anchor Hocking instead of Pyrex, and the lid does come off as the contents gets hot. Edit: bought a second, larger one, for road trips. A metal cake pan with a plastic lid, (the cheap kind that you can buy at the grocery store) zips in there just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. KRM

customer_reviews.title: Best idea! Covid Times Convenience
customer_reviews.text: To help cutdown on traffic in the kitchen at work, a coworker suggested I start heating up my food at my desk. The cleaning protocols at work due to covid are little much to handle when you’re trying to get through a 30 min lunch and 7 people are also waiting for the microwave. I heat up soups, pastas, oatmeal and meat. 4 of us now use it daily. For steaming hot food we plug in 2 hours before lunch. For warm one hour. Definitely a great buy. Makes a good secret Santa gift this year!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great if you work "on the road"
customer_reviews.text: Was looking through my history for his purchase to find that I bought it almost 2 years ago. My husband still loves it. (He suggested it to me as a Christmas gift. I was a little questionable.) He works in TV and spends most evenings at "live shots" away from an office microwave or even fast food some nights. With this item, he actually eats leftovers. Pops them in and can eat a warm meal out in a blizzard if he has to. It's pretty amazing technology and has kept the husband fed for almost 2 years now!
customer_reviews.author: Teri Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.  Perfect solution for my situation.
customer_reviews.text: This is what it is, a portable Oven. There is no microwave in my office, so I was purchasing from the cafeteria every day. That was a lot of $$$ on lunch. With the HotLogic, I bring my food from home or any left overs from the cafeteria. I heats the food perfectly, I plug it 1.5 hours prior to my lunch and the food is steaming hot and perfect for consumption every time. I will advice to get a tray to mount on your steering wheel if you eat in your car, because the container will be way too hot to hold on your hands. I got me the "Cutequeen Black car Laptop /Eating Wheel Desk."
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Functionally particular
customer_reviews.text: Untill this moment it works fine. Was a gift for my husband, he works all day and he never has a opportunity of get warm food. When he carried food from home always the food was cold, so he has ate like that, but now he enjoys eat warm food every day, specially in this cold days. My husband said that he connect his food around of 45 minutes before to lunch to get hot food. Depending what you want to eat is going to take the time to warm your food before you eat. It brings a manual with tips to get warm food and some recipes. It a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: Melyce

customer_reviews.title: Want a hot meal instead of a cold sandwich?
customer_reviews.text: The simpler something is, the more effective and relevant it probably is also. I couldn't be happier with this item. Very reasonable price, works just as described. You can put pretty much anything in it- plastic, paper or the Pyrex containers I bought that fit perfectly size-wise. I do 6 12 hour over nights a week and it's nice to not have to eat a cold sandwich every night. Now besides my hot coffee I can also have a hot meal. As a retired army ranger I particularly appreciate appropriate gear. Especially as it relates to eating well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Appleton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the 1st time just after receiving it, and all I can say is WOW! Wish I'd have ordered it sooner! Made a pre packaged meal from the grocery, and after only 1 hour, it was cooked better than the microwave oven ever could! Will be ordering this for family members as gifts in the future! Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: It's a Covid Miracle Cooker
customer_reviews.text: My office closed the lunchroom microwaves and all of the restaurants are closed so I purchased this warming tote. I LOVE IT!!! I used it several times a day. First for my morning cinnamon rolls and then for lunch. Everyone in my office was so jealous and finally bough their own. This is a lifesaver and I will use it instead of the microwave because the food comes out evenly warmed. It's so hot that you have steam in the dish, but cool enough that you won't burn your mouth. It's a Win Win !
customer_reviews.author: Spunky Redhead

customer_reviews.title: Love this lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch bag. I don’t have a picture because I leave this bag at work at my desk. I heat all my lunch’s up in this bag a few hours before lunch. It be very hot so it’s nothing to complain about and I warm up a few breakfast sandwich’s. I don’t want to touch the microwave at work because of coronavirus.
customer_reviews.author: Aries JMC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work
customer_reviews.text: I hate eating sandwiches everyday and the microwaves at work get so gross. I only have a half hour for lunch, so it is awesome to have a hot lunch ready when I get a chance to take a break. I have only used mine twice so far but I love it already. Not only was my frozen dinner ready for me but it stayed warm a lot longer than if I had cooked it in the microwave. No need to read directions, just pop to frozen dinner box in the mini and plug it in, a couple of hours later and lunch is hot and ready. Can't wait to try more things in my mini.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer K

customer_reviews.title: Mostly works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great when I'm traveling or don't want to fight the frozen dinner crowd at the workplace. Those meals take forever to cook! I can work at my desk while my lunch heats up. I love multitasking! I did notice now that sometimes it overheats and doesn't 'hold' temp as it advertises. I can work with this by adjusting the time I keep it on. No big deal
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Shopper

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!! Bought to heat up food in hotel rooms (hotel restaurants were mostly closed during the Covid-19 pandemic). While it does take a while to heat up food, it is perfect. It takes just a little longer me than changing clothes, going to the restaurant, ordering and then being served. I’ll be using this for as long as it works.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Our office only has one microwave for 200+ employees, which means it could take 15 minutes or more before I could get my meal into the microwave to heat it. This was a perfect solution to get my lunch hot and not waste my entire lunch time just waiting to heat it up. I had concerns that it wouldn't work, but it worked better than my best expectations. I have cooked both leftovers and frozen meals by putting in the hot logic at 8 am, and would eat lunch at noon.. All parts of the meal were perfect temperature. All my co-workers are looking to buy their own.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use my Hot Logic Mini almost daily and love it! I typically work through lunch and often get distracted when trying to eat but my food stays hot. The only problem I have is about 2 weeks after the warranty expired the coating on the heating pad started to peel, but it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for the traveling territory managers/salesmen!
customer_reviews.text: Stop thinking and just buy this. Best $40 I've spent all year. I travel 50,000 miles a year for work. Finding this has been a godsend. I pack 2 meals in the morning and hit the road. Plug this in after I leave an account around 11:00am and I'm eating a meal by 11:45 that tastes like it came out of my oven. It doesn't dry your meals out like. A microwave either. So if your in an office environment I would much rather use this than the nasty company microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Clozer

customer_reviews.title: Works slow but with nice temperature and is light
customer_reviews.text: I used more for work lunch time; is light what is good for carry it. I like the temperature that use is nice controled and it does not smell. but it really takes its time...I had to put it 1 hour for get my lunch hot enought. And the cleaning became complex if some small portions fall inside or in a sauce accident you really had to do a meticulus clean or when you opened you will always had the felling than something smells different from your lunch For travel is just great, a warm sanwdich witout too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime López

customer_reviews.title: Conveniency
customer_reviews.text: I do like this item because it’s very convenient. The only thing is when it comes to heating up your food it takes well over an hour for your food to be cooked especially if you have home-cooked meals. If you freeze the food in you thaw it out it will take at least two hours for it to be the way a person would like to eat it. Otherwise it takes about an hour and a half to heat up your food. Besides that. In my opinion it’s a good product to have.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: So many good things to say about this item, CHANGED my life
customer_reviews.text: Love this little Mini Portable Oven, no longer need to stand in line at the community microwave at work! I can meal prep uncooked meals, freeze them then cook them at my desk at work. Easy to clean. I bought an A/C adapter for the car for road trips then use in a hotel for frozen dinners, either those I have made myself and brought but usually something from a local grocery store. The money saved from eating out adds up quickly not to mention the healthier meals and lifestyle. The customer service should also be noted, they are FANTASTIC!!! Responded to an issue I was having immediately and quickly solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Says Squat

customer_reviews.title: Game changer !
customer_reviews.text: I travel for work, and this has helped to bring a new level of comfort and cost-savings to my game. At night I prepare old-fashioned oats, and it is hot and ready for me in the morning. To heat a cold, dense meal may take some time (2 hours). It's great also for just heating up some bread to go with your meal. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kittylover

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little device!
customer_reviews.text: This lil lunchbox has been a Godsend during Covid! We’re bk to the office full time but the kitchens are closed. While everyone else is eating cold sandwiches & orderibg out every day, I’m enjoying tasty, piping hot meals right at my desk. I par-cook everything at home the night before, plug it in when i get to work in the morning & presto- hot meal cooked to perfection! I’ll be giving some of these gifts as Xmas gifts this year for sure. So handy!
customer_reviews.author: Holley Ackerson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing my husband could have ever found to heat up his food at work! It has saved us hundreds of dollars because he does not have to eat out while working anymore. He is limited to where he is stationed at work and could not always get to somewhere he can heat his food and this is something he can take with him and heat anywhere. Also, he can set it up so his food is ready and hot at lunch and dinner time at work. He loves this and all of his co-workers have ordered one too.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Absolutly love this lunch box oven
customer_reviews.text: I teach. most days I had to either have a cold lunch or use a microwave (something I do not like to do). Now, I come to class around 9:30 a.m. plug it in, and by 11:45 I have a hot, delicious lunch. I have used it for leftovers, soup, even fresh pizza (I put the precooked pizza bread, add sauce, peppers, cheese, etc. and at lunchtime - voila! all melted and hot. It didn't burn edges, and it heats up evenly...just like they said it would. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Line

customer_reviews.title: This Portable Oven Is Very Useful For My Elderly Mother
customer_reviews.text: This is great for when I have to leave my elderly mother early in the day but she needs her dinner in the evening. I leave her meal in a cooler for her. She inserts her meal in the portable oven 2 hours prior to needing it. It is set up on a socket timer so that it turns itself on to heat the food up 2 hours prior to her dinner time and turns itself off after her dinner time. Her meals are warm and ready for her when I can’t be around.
customer_reviews.author: B. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Works great, gets very hot
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Would be nice if there was one size larger available for the lunchbox itself. I have moved the element to another lunchbox I have that is also foil lined. The element has no temperature control but that is not a deal breaker. I just think about how long it will take to heat the food. And it does get very hot. I make sure to use glass bowls in it to be safe. One reviewer showed 180deg for the element temp. Awesome for heating my lunch as it sits on my desk. I eat at my desk a lot and it is nice to have the food heated while I am on conference calls.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Z

customer_reviews.title: Great Amazon find must need if you work, especially if there’s no microwave.
customer_reviews.text: If you work in a setting where you only have 30 minutes to warm your food and eat. Then this is the item for you! Plus it in at your desk allow your food to warm, it can take 30 min to an hour it’s like a slow cooker. It hides well looks just like a lunch tote and by the time lunch hour hits your food is already warm. No need to waist time standing in line waiting for your turn in the microwave! Definite buy if you have a lot of people using the same microwave!
customer_reviews.author: Alymo

customer_reviews.title: Very useful product.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this a few times, but so far it works as described. It is safe to use on a table or desk for example. I've been using it to heat up one-serving microwave meals (such as the Hormel Compleats).. It will heat up one (or two - there is room enough for two such meals, side by side) in 20-30 minutes. I plan to use it on a camping trip later this summer. I will update this review then as to how that worked out.
customer_reviews.author: TDEngines

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! It heats up fast and holds a constant temperature, just hot enough to make your food steam. I wouldn't cook raw food in it, but I use it to heat up my lunches (leftovers) when I am stuck in the truck driving around. It usually takes about an hour to heat from refrigerator cold to steaming (depending on how dense your food is). Its great though. My only dislike is how small it is. The mini is definitely mini, you can fit one medium size Tupperware container in it and that's it. So make sure you pay attention to the dimensions before you by this or the normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A trustable product from a responsible manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I was unhappy with the first one I bought and had to return it as it took longer to heat... but the manufacturer reached out to me .... offered a new one for free and that piece is working well as described ~ 60-90 minutes of heating time for packaged food and liquids. I'm quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Best investment for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite purchases! As a flight attendant, I’m sick of eating out! With this handy device, I rarely buy food when traveling! It heats a frozen meal in about 90 minutes and cold-room temp in 30-45. I can leave food on it for 12 hours and it never burns or scorches my food! It fits nicely in the top pouch of my Ebags lunch tote! I’ve dubbed it the “slam-click oven”.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! It's so nice having hot lunches from home at work without having to ruin them in the microwave, or being restricted to what I could reheat. Only problem I have is remembering to put my food in early enough. But if I just put it in once I get to work it gets hot by lunch time no problem and it stays hot. Depending on what you are re-heating though you might slightly start to cook it, especially if it's a small portion. But I have a 9x6 Pyrex baking dish that has the nice silicone and glass lid that works perfect in it.
customer_reviews.author: MadCatIV

customer_reviews.title: Great for travels
customer_reviews.text: I took this little thing on a train trip that spanned a couple of days. Wanted nice hot food without having to pay that expensive train food fee. This worked brilliantly. Of coarse it takes a while to heat your stuff, so be aware that you need to start heating about an hour before you're ready to eat. I usually just put my food in and put on a movie. By the time the movie was half way through, food was hot and ready to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Dark

customer_reviews.title: Love this product and I use it every day!
customer_reviews.text: I work as a home health nurse, I don't like to use other peoples items. I bring this with me to work daily to heat my food, yes is not super fast but it does what it's supposed to do! It's not leak proof so becareful how you package your items but it's a good size and it heats up my food in approximately 30 to 60 minutes depending on what it is and how cold it is. Frozen tv dinners take a bit longer than an hour but tbh they taste even better due to the slow heating!
customer_reviews.author: hugo uriostegui

customer_reviews.title: After 3 years use
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years regularly use, it still works like new. It heats up slow but it is as described. I don’t recommend to use to to cook raw meat , but heating up food is not a problem for it to do if you allow it to have 1.5 hours at least. Over all is a good tool for heating up food if you don’t have access to microwave
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for EMS
customer_reviews.text: I heard about this through the grapevine, saw the great ratings and gave it a try. I'm an EMT and I have grown tired of eating out on long shifts. The Wendy's, Subways and Burger Joints were taking their toll on my physically and mentally. I can put food from home in this at the start of my shift, and when it's time to eat the food is ready to go. It sits perfectly buckled into a sanitized seat in the back. Pros: •Small and Portable •Food comes out Perfectly •Not hot to touch on the exterior. Cons: •Small ~ This is good and bad. It can't really fit more than one meal/entree, but maybe thats my poor packing skills.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: What did I do about lunch before???
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It allows me to put a frozen meal in a sealed, small container and it will perfectly heat AND KEEP food warm without drying out until I have a break for lunch. I'm busy, and the timing of my lunch is variable. HotLogic allows me to go into my office, close the door and remove my mask to eat without a trip to the communal lunch room and microwave. It sounds like a small thing, but having hot food ready whenever I'm ready: terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Just plug it in and wait for it to do its job. However, it does take some time to heat a small bowl and it depends on the contents too. If you expect it to be like a microwave, it is not for you. It may take 30 mins to 1hr to heat the meal properly but it's worth it if you plan ahead and don't want to use the communal microwave at work. Good perk is that you can eat your meal while keeping it warm the whole time. Super easy to clean and good size.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for leftovers or frozen dinners. Food goes from frozen solid to piping hot in just a few hours. Frozen chicken is moist and delicious, not rubbery like the microwave. Best of all, it fits in my desk. The nearest microwave to my office is down a flight of stairs and a long hallway. Now I just pop my lunch in the Hot Logic and plug it in and it is ready by lunchtime. The only problem I have had was when a put a flimsy deli container in it, which melted. The unit cleaned up nicely and no harm done. Glass or thicker (rubbermaid) plastic works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisaphant

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last ... See Edit: great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Was good as long as it lasted. Coating on the hot plate started blistering and flaking little by little, even though I was very very careful on how i cleaned it. Contacting customer service to see how they will deal with it. Will update review after I get their feedback. UPDATE: contacted customer service and they were amazing. They sent me a replacement pad telling me it wasn't supposed to have done that. Those guys stand by their product. I will buy again from them.
customer_reviews.author: ArizonaSun

customer_reviews.title: Great idea  good product. Buy it
customer_reviews.text: What a surprise. I really like this unit. In 4 hrs your food is hot. You do need some liquid or sauce in with food. It hold a 6 cup container. But to much food for a lunch. So I bought a 3 cup Pyrex rectangle glass container. I liked it so much I ordered some for presents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: My BF uses this for his lunch since he is a painter and travels to different jobsites. No more having to hunt for a microwave or eat a cold lunch. I actually purchased a cheaper version of this when he needed another one and ended up coming straight back to HotLogic. They had the same look but definitely not the same quality. I have purchased several of these since his friends like them now as well. (Even bought me a pink one!) Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: jamie travisflores

customer_reviews.title: What can you say?  It's a classic.
customer_reviews.text: Loved by flight crews, serious travelers and office jockeys alike - the hot logic is a classic. I cook my hot breakfast over night in my hotel room, or my dinner while out sightseeing etc.. Can be plugged in for hours, cooks or reheats your food, then holds it warm without burning it. Ingenious device. If you work in an office, your lunch can be cooking or heating while you work. Super light weight for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Tereen Hough

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient and simple, and makes it easier to eat healthy when time is a factor
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I have not tried anything very complex, but I just love the simplicity of being able to put something in there a few hours before lunch and having it cooked to perfect temperature when I'm ready. My go to so far is a frozen chicken breast and frozen broccoli in a pyrex dish with lid. Cooks perfectly in a few hours, and is delicious and healthy, and way better than reheating the same thing in the microwave...plus requires pretty much no advanced prep (except for remembering to plug it in a few hours before lunch). Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: C. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Love my HotLogic Mini
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my HotLogic Mini. In my many travels for work, eating out can be expensive and, I found that eating restaurant food on a regular basis causes me to gain weight. Traveling with my HotLogic mini which fits easily in my suitcase allows me to prepare my food at home and heat it up in the comfort of my hotel room. Heating food generally takes approximately 45 minutes to an hour. So, I sometimes plan a workout around the wait time or just relax. The HotLogic is not a microwave, so with that in mind, I don't let the wait time bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times, but it's worked well so far. It's lightweight, and easy to use. There's a learning curve when trying to determine how long to let something warm up to your liking. (But there's always a learning curve with new items, & it depends on your preference.) It's definitely a convenient device. I can't speak on durability at this point because I haven't had it long. I'm not sure it's an item that will receive heavy use; perhaps 2 to 3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: A. A. U.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great for Heating Up Food
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I plug it in when I get to work and I'm able to have hot lunches/dinners on my break without the need for a microwave. It heats things up so much more evenly than a microwave does. I haven't tried using it with uncooked food yet, but I cook my food at home and store it in the fridge/freezer then just warm it up with this. It's exactly what I needed to get out of my habit of cold lunches and I'm just more upset I never bought it before now!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Flight Attendants
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little hot logic mini!! I’m a flight attendant and sometimes I have super long sits in airports in between flights and this is perfect for warming up my food! I also love it when there isn’t a microwave in my hotel room and don’t feel like using the communal one in the lobby! Pop my food in go for a walk or workout and come back my food is warm!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Curry

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the communal appliances were all removed from our cafeteria area due to the pandemic and there was no way to heat food. So far everything has been very warm. I did read reviews for tips before purchasing. So far I have only used to heat/reheat food and can't speak on cooking in it from scratch, but it definitely works and beats weeks of cold sandwiches and cereal.
customer_reviews.author: stglide13

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing.  Improves taste of frozen dinners
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a power inverter to use in car, didn't realize there are 2 types, one for car one for house. LOVE IT!!! I used it in the house and it work amazingly. I cooked a microwave dinner that I always eat and WOW!! Try it, the tv dinner tadted completely different cooked in this. It wasn't dry and crunchy as usual, it was tender and moist. I love it! You really have to try a box that is usually nuked and see the difference in taste!! (Not the reason I bought this, got it for my son who works on highway, far away from any fast food or convenience store)
customer_reviews.author: E. P.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the best invention ever!! husband works out in the field doing service calls all day or isn't near a kitchen. He plugs it into his service truck an hour or two before noon and leaves it until he has time to eat. The food is always a perfect temperature and ready to eat. Hasn't burned any food yet and we purchased the recommended containers with it for very reasonable price, works amazing. Saves us a TON of money since he doesn't have to eat fast food or at gas stations anymore. Definately recommend and definately worth every penny!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must during COVID
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my Lean Cuisine/Smart Ones frozen at office, then heat up ready in 45 minutes. Just plug it in before break. Plug and forget, easy to use. It doesn't overheat food. Tip, wrap a aluminum sheet on the heat plate, then you don't need to worry about stains. It also acts like a protective layer between the food and the plate.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Y.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food the perfect temperature, never burns.
customer_reviews.text: Such a simple little innovation, it's a little hot plate in a bag. At only 45w a lot of newer cars can power the 115v version, or a very inexpensive inverter will do the job. I suspect these will also run just fine off 74v DC power, though they probably won't get as hot. Many imitators out there these days, but I opted for the original and I'm glad!
customer_reviews.author: Dtho

customer_reviews.title: Functional and reasonable
customer_reviews.text: For the price and the convenience, I really can't complain. The only thing I just want to make clear is that because the black heating thingy is really what makes the food hot, it only heats on the side of that is in direct contact with it! So if I put a sandwich in this container, and I put the heating thingy on top of the sandwich, that's the side that's gonna be hot. So I usually go back and switch the flip the sandwich every so often if I can. Otherwise, it's still reasonable. I've used it many times at events, and it beats room temperature sandwiches that are meant to be hot!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband that drives 15 hrs one way to deliver Cargo....Due to covid....I did not want him to buy food, snacks, drinks ect....When I cook, I freeze a meal from it and place in his cooler to take....This is perfect! It is steaming hot and juicey....HE LOVES THIS!
customer_reviews.author: roni

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought. ..
customer_reviews.text: Didn't cook the food right. Very hard to find a container with smooth bottom. This item needs to come with cooking container. The writing on bottom of glass, aluminum, or plastic containers leaves a raise that stops it from evenly cooking.
customer_reviews.author: chilton

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this to cook anything, but I love it for taking my lunch to work. I don't believe in the use of microwave ovens and this is the perfect solution for a hot lunch. To save on clean-up I wrap most foods in foil and eat it directly out of the HotLigic then just throw away the foil and I'm ready for the next day.
customer_reviews.author: LSC

customer_reviews.title: This item is perfect for the office
customer_reviews.text: My place of employment don't have microwaves to heat our food. The company want the employees to support the buildings cafeteria. The food is nasty. While browsing amazon I ran across this item and decided to purchase it. When it arrived I was excited to bring thanksgiving leftovers and OMG. it was easy to use and my food was heated at the perfect temperature at my desk. I'm saving a lot of money and I'm able to eat healthy. WOOT!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great idea! Useful during COVID-19!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a couple times, but this is a great way to heat up food at your desk and minimize touching communal microwaves at work, especially during this pandemic. You just need to plan ahead when you intend to eat and get cooking/warming 90 minutes or more in advance. Bring in a long-lasting cooler and you won’t need a fridge either.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after short amount of time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, loved it, kept it at work and unplugged it religiously and very gently every day, and within a very short period of time, the heating element went out. I am going to try with a second one (I've returned the first) and hopefully I have better luck as it was great when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: LeftHandedAquarius

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lunch box for hot foods. Have used it to keep dip hot at a pot luck and for hot lunches. Used once for a frozen boxed lunch and it worked - just put the unopened box and all in it. It would be great if this company would make a larger version ( not as big as their 9x12 casserole bag) so that more than one serving could be carried.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described! Excellent product! This is the best thing since sliced bread!! I work outdoors all day and tired of sandwiches, I've put everything I can think of in this little dude and never been disappointed, one trick I've figured out is if you got something you want to heat up that you don't want a lot of moisture on, wrap it tightly in aluminum foil, heats the food with much less steam and moisture. I put left over pizza wrapped in foil and crust was still crunchy! You won't be disappointed if you buy this, I'd give 1,000 stars if I could!!
customer_reviews.author: Lineman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food hot at a good temperature
customer_reviews.text: My husband was eating sandwiches for a while, but wanted hot food. He doesn't like using the microwave, so I decided to purchase this item. It is functional and warms up the food inside evenly and well. He plugs it in 30 min before lunch and can enjoy a hot lunch everyday. He wishes that it would get hotter, but I think the heat level is great.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQT

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Due to COVID, my company took away all the microwaves for the 4,000+ employees. Since I don't think I can eat cold foods for a few more months, I was told about this food warmer and I love this! I did a test by taking fried rice right out of the fridge and into the food warmer. It was the perfect temperature after 1.5 hours. I'm so glad someone came up with this to help those that are unable to heat up their food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot, don't touch the black hotplate
customer_reviews.text: My coworker got this, so I checked it out on Amazon and added to my list. During a lightning sale I bought this to use at work too. I use it to heat up refrigerated leftovers in glass tupperware. It works faster than I thought, since I let my food sit in room temperature in the morning, then heat it in this mini hot plate oven about 30 minutes before my lunch break. I mistakenly touched the black hot plate after ten minutes to see if it's hot, and my fingers regretted it. I don't ever have to wait in line to microwave my food anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. the only reason I am returning it is because it Is very small, I would recommend the $80 size if you are that serious of eating out of this thing because it takes forever to heat up food. (none of my tuber wares fit this size). I also would like to inform you guys that it takes about 2 and a half hours to heat up anything. I recommend the bigger size because you will be able to flip tortillas on the part your not using and on this size your not able to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: We used this in our hotel room to help save cash on a week long vacation. We precooked roast beef, mashed potatoes, taco meat, chicken and mixed veg and then froze them in the glass pyrex containers. We threw them in a cooler for the trip and then popped them in the hotlogic about 45 minutes before we wanted to eat. They heated up like a dream and made the vacation even better because we could have a hot cooked meal for dinner without dropping $25 a person. Which freed up that money for us go out and have fun doing things instead of spending more cash to keep us fueled.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Really performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This thing works like magic. Purchased on the recommendation of a friend. Warms food evenly, defrosts thoroughly. Food is tender and juicy. Never dries out food. I didn’t believe it until I used it myself. Great for my office where we have no kitchen or lunch options. Several more friends in the office have purchased. Only thing I would like it to see product come in a variety of sizes and shapes.
customer_reviews.author: The Wanderer "Wendy"

customer_reviews.title: Mini personal oven
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing! If your one that gets tired of having to microwave your food everyday,due to work,this will be perfect for you!! I plug it in hour and half before my break and when it's time,it comes out nice and hot,not dried up and flavorless like the microwave does to your food. Now when I make a healthy dinner I know I'm getting all the nutrients. Not like the microwave were it zaps all your nutrients and your basically eating empty calories! I totally recommend this. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas. He works at a university and the age old problem of not enough and/or dirty microwaves exists. His only 2 choices was to stand in line to use the less than desirable condition microwaves or spend needless dollars eating out. I found a 2 section lunch bag that holds the Hot Logic in the bottom section and his food containers in the top section. The first day he used the Hot Logic he sent me a text saying "Thanks, the hot plate worked great!!"
customer_reviews.author: K. Hunter

product_meta.title: Hot Logic 16801060004 Food Warming Tote, Lunch, Blue
product_meta.description: Size:Lunch| Color:BlueA little like a microwave, a little like a crock pot, but a whole lot better, this portable oven and food warmer is ideal for lunch at the office, parties and potlucks, and home kitchen use. It evenly cooks or reheats fresh or frozen meats and vegetables—even leftovers—without burning or drying your food. Using a heating element, it brings your food to the ideal temperature—and holds it there until you’re ready, whether that’s in two hours or twelve. There’s no monitoring needed; just place your meal inside, plug it in, and go about your day.
feature_bullets: Ideal for preparing healthy meals and warm comfort food at home, in the office, or at parties, potlucks, or gatherings
Evenly cooks or reheats fresh or frozen meats and vegetables - even leftovers - without burning or drying your food
Compatible with most flat-bottom containers with sealable lids, including glass, plastic, tupperware, metal, aluminum foil, and cardboard - upto 8. 75-Inch W x 6. 75-Inch L x 2. 5-Inch
Requires no monitoring - just place your meal inside, plug it in, and go about your day, whether it’s work or play
Backed by our make it right and a customer service team that has one job: To leave you utterly and completely overjoyed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,159 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
